title: JSON schema for KarmaTestAdapter configuration files (KarmaTestAdapter.json)

KarmaConfigFile.description: Use this if you want to use a karma configuration file not named karma.conf.js.

Disabled.description: Set to true, if the Karma test adapter should be disabled for this karma configuration file.

LogToFile.description: Set to true, if you want the adapter to write log statements to a log file (named KarmaTestAdapter.log).

LogDirectory.description: Where the log file should be saved (if LogToFile is true). If this property is not specified the directory in which KarmaTestAdapter.json resides is used.

config.description: This property overwrites any configurations from the karma configuration file.
